For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277292. "Strength" 
The perfect workhorse. This bakkie is big, it is tough and it is practical with enough space inside to be comfortable and a big load box. The Isuzu D- Max 250 HO  Single Cab is a beauty, lovely growl and with this extra powerful engine. It will ensure that any job is completed whether it is carrying heavy loads, towing tons of gear or tackling tough terrains. The reason people buy Isuzu is the strength of the body. This vehicle will be with you for the long run !
